code: import React from"react";import{PieChart,Pie,Cell,ResponsiveContainer,Tooltip,Legend}from"recharts";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const COLORS=["#8B5CF6","#3B82F6","#10B981","#F59E0B","#EF4444","#EC4899"];const CategoryDistributionChart=_ref=>{let{category_distribution}=_ref;if(!category_distribution||!category_distribution.labels||!category_distribution.data){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-gray-800 bg-opacity-50 backdrop-blur-md shadow-lg rounded-xl p-6 border border-gray-700",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-xl font-semibold mb-4",children:"Category Distribution"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex items-center justify-center",style:{height:300},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-gray-400",children:"No data to display"})})]});}const data=category_distribution.labels.map((label,index)=>({name:label,value:category_distribution.data[index]}));return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"category-distribution-chart",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-xl font-semibold mb-4",children:"Category Distribution"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{width:"100%",height:470},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ResponsiveContainer,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(PieChart,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Pie,{data:data,cx:"50%",cy:"50%",labelLine:true,outerRadius:150,fill:"#8884d8",dataKey:"value",label:_ref2=>{let{name,percent}=_ref2;return`${name}: ${(percent*100).toFixed(0)}%`;},children:data.map((entry,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Cell,{fill:COLORS[index%COLORS.length]},`cell-${index}`))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Tooltip,{contentStyle:{backgroundColor:"rgba(31, 41, 55, 0.8)",borderColor:"#4B5563"},itemStyle:{color:"#E5E7EB"}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Legend,{})]})})})]});};export default CategoryDistributionChart;
